name: HeroSquare STTP - Jam Version
description:
YOU are HEROSQUARE
DEFENDER of PLACE

Your Mission:
Defeat That Giggly Snob DOCTOR SPHERE
By hitting bombs at him
Yeah

/----------\

FOREWORD / INSTRUCTIONS

HeroSquare is a little mini-game thrown together in between getting distracted by everything under the sun. Probably more a proof of concept than a proper game.
It's simplistic and silly, but at least it got done, right?
Maybe it'll get an independent continuation, we'll see.

The game is internally rendered at 64x64, as per jam rules; The window is locked to 3x upscale for visibility(and because unity won't let me make it any smaller without freaking out and breaking things).

Arrows or WASD will make HeroSquare go that way if possible; if not, he'll queue that direction and turn that way as soon as he can.
Space will make HeroSquare charge in the direction he's moving. You can't stop or turn while charging.
Z will stop HeroSquare in his tracks. Not much to say there.
More detailed instructions are in the zip if you need them.
